quest.name: A Good Role Model
journal: Serpent Marshal Brookstone is looking to make an example out of someone.
objectives: Speak with the Twin Adder recruits.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: Good eveningGood morningGood day to you, Forename[GC Rank] Surname. Still fighting the good fight, I take it? Would that we had more soldiers like you.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: I cannot speak for the Immortal Flames or the Maelstrom, but we of the Twin Adder are not accustomed to combat in such wide-open expanses.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: The beasts that roam these lands are quite dangerous, and to be frank, our new recruits are simply not up to the task of fending them off. For you, I imagine it would be like crushing ants underfoot.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: That is why I would ask you to give my men a brief lesson in combat by slaying the antlions at Pike Falls. I've instructed them to stay well out of sight, so you should have no trouble fighting without distraction. When you've finished, any advice you can offer them would no doubt be invaluable to their training.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: They've been instructed to watch you closely, albeit from a safe distance. I'm sure they will take to heart any advice you can offer them afterward.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERMAN02659
dialogue.text: I'll never be a match for the Garleans if I can't even defeat an antlion.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERWOMAN02659
dialogue.text: I wasn't expecting the antlions to be so tough.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERMAN02659
dialogue.text: It's an honor to meet you, misssir. To watch you fight was quite inspiring. Tell me, did you have any tactics in mind before engaging the antlions?

dialogue.name: CHOICE1Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: CHOICE1A1
dialogue.text: Finding their weak points is key.

dialogue.name: CHOICE1A2
dialogue.text: Only to keep swinging until victory was assured.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERMAN02659
dialogue.text: Yes, of course. I noticed how you consistently aimed for what seemed to be soft spots between their shell plating. I can't promise your words will remain with me in the heat of battle, but I will do my best not to disappoint you or my superiors.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERMAN02659
dialogue.text: I...I see... Yes, I suppose all enemies eventually yield to your superior strength. <sigh> I have much, much more training ahead of me, don't I?

dialogue.name: SOLDIERWOMAN02659
dialogue.text: Forename Surname of the Maelstrom![GC Rank] Surname!Forename Surname of the Immortal Flames! The rumors of your prowess do no justice to what I just witnessed. What is your secret?

dialogue.name: CHOICE1Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: CHOICE1A1
dialogue.text: Keep moving and wait for an opening.

dialogue.name: CHOICE1A2
dialogue.text: Battles just seem to work out in my favor.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERWOMAN02659
dialogue.text: Seeing your nimble footwork firsthand, it is hard to refute the truth in that. Truth be told I'm a rather clumsy fellow, but I will practice every day until I'm as sure-footed as the illustrious Forename Surname.

dialogue.name: SOLDIERWOMAN02659
dialogue.text: What? Do you mean to say you've come all this way simply because the unseen hands of fate demand you be victorious? If only I could have armor so thick as that...

dialogue.name: SOLDIERWOMAN02659
dialogue.text: Pray excuse me, I...I need time to think on this...

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: Welcome back. The men seem transformed having met you, though I suppose you're accustomed to having that effect on people.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: Sadly I have no memorable acts of daring with which I can inspire them.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: Still, I'm heartened to know there are those like you to whom they can look up to, who will inspire them to train harder.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: I'll be the first to admit I was skeptical when they first began enlisting adventurers in the Grand Companies, but I'm glad my doubts were proven unfounded.

dialogue.name: SWETHRYKBROOKSTONE
dialogue.text: Safe travels, Forename[GC Rank].
